verses.verse: Verily <WG281> , verily <WG281> , I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , He that entereth <WG1525> not <WG3361> by <WG1223> the door <WG2374> into <WG1519> the sheepfold <WG4263><WG833> , but <WG235> climbeth up <WG305> some other way <WG237> , the same <WG1565> is <WG2076> a thief <WG2812> and <WG2532> a robber <WG3027> .

Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> unto them<WG846> again<WG3825>, Verily <WG281> , verily <WG281> , I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213><WG3754> , I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the door <WG2374> of the sheep <WG4263> .

<WG1161> The hireling <WG3411> fleeth <WG5343> , because <WG3754> he is <WG2076> an hireling <WG3411> , and <WG2532><WG846> careth <WG3199> not <WG3756> for <WG4012> the sheep <WG4263> .

My <WG1699> sheep <WG4263> hear <WG191> my <WG3450> voice <WG5456> , and I <WG2504> know <WG1097> them <WG846> , and <WG2532> they follow <WG190> me <WG3427> :
